SaveVideo is a powerful and user-friendly extension designed to help you quickly save and download your favorite photos or videos from Instagram.

How to Use SaveVideo on Chrome Browser?
1. Open the Chrome browser and visit Instagram.com.
2. Find the photo or video you want to download.
3. Tap the "Download" button in the top right corner of the Photo or Video.
4. A new tab will open, displaying the content you want to download. From here, you can save it directly to your device.

Important Note:

After installing the extension, make sure to reload the tab where you wish to download the video or photo so that SaveVideo can recognize the file.
